page.title: 11HOUSING COTLEIGH/STOCKLAND.
page.content: There are 12 council houses in Cotleigh.Farms are scattered, consisting of up to 400 acres, the majority being from 50 to 100 acres.Some farms have been sold to retired people and the land sold to other farmers.Cottages are also bought and extensions added.These are then priced too high for local people to buy and so the area contains a large number of retired people.New housing is restricted to agricultural needs. There are a number of thatched and cob houses, some of them medieval,although increasingly thatch is being replaced by tiles,due to the exceedingly high cost of rethatching.
